articles.author: Josh Halliday
articles.title: UK coronavirus home test kits run out as eligibility list is expanded - The Guardian
articles.description: Apparent shortage comes day after Matt Hancock expanded list of people who can get test
articles.content:
The NHS appeared to run out of its daily allocation of home testing kits within hours on Tuesday morning after Matt Hancock said anyone aged five and over with symptoms could get tested for coronavirus.
Those trying to order a home test kit were left disappo… [+1880 chars]

articles.author: Tom Dare
articles.title: West Midlands Police issue five lockdown dispersal notices to one person - expressandstar.com
articles.description: Police in the West Midlands have issued five dispersal notices to just one person since the start of lockdown, it has been revealed.
articles.content:
And a further eight people from across the region have been told to disperse on four separate occasions, papers from a police meeting have shown. 
Speaking during the West Midlands Police and Crime Commissioners (PCC) strategic policing and crime board meeti… [+2011 chars]
